channel.title: Minor Help. [PI]
channel.description:
[B]Well when I have The Full slayer helmet equipped it extends my head up and my neck is clear. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2jb8osj.jpg[/img]
And Pernix armour is a bit invisible in some areas of the character. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/14934ol.jpg[/img]
In Clan Chat, every first letter of a word and every letter after a punctuation is capitalized. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/219nqsg.jpg[/img]
Also, I need to add the "setlevel" command, ie ::setlevel 0 1 playername.[/B]

item.title: Minor Help. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Dayne Dayne
item.description:
@Dayne wrote:

Dont be sad. Youve made another poor orphan kid smile. :]
Thanks though, Im working on this project with a friend of mine, and Im trying to suprise him by fixing a few things.

Read full topic

Clearly fucking me over once again.

item.title: Minor Help. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Dayne Dayne
item.description:
@Dayne wrote:

When ever I compiled, I get this error:

Since I’m new to this whole “coding” thing, I’m not sure what these errors mean.

Edit: Also, the file to change the “title case” is ClanChatHandler.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Minor Help. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

First two seem like client-side issues and should be posted in the appropriate section.

As for the clan chat, perhaps you’re sending the text in “title case”.

And for the command, all you would have to do is something like

if (command.equals("setlevel")) {
    int skill = 0;
    int level = 0;
    try {
        skill = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
        level = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
    }
    catch (final NumberFormatException exception) {
        exception.printStackTrace();
        return;
    }
    setSkillLevel(skill, level);
}

Read full topic
